Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/Prairie
ShortDescription: Eastbound #47 buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Indiana, 43rd, King Drive, and 47th, due to construction near 47th/Prairie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Indiana, 43rd, King Drive, and 47th, due to construction near 47th/Prairie.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Service Delayed Ashland/Lake
ShortDescription: Green Line trains continue to stand at Ashland/Lake due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains continue to stand at Ashland/Lake due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #4 Cottage, #8 Halsted, #9 Ashland, and #29 State.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Service Between 54th/Cermak and Morgan Stations, Only
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running only as far as Morgan due to signal problems at Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running only as far as Morgan due to signal problems at Ashland.

If you take a bus to/from Pink Line trains, you might also consider transferring between your bus route and Blue Line service on its Forest Park branch, where available, as another alternative. These may include: #21 Cermak.

We appreciate your patience as we work to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
